尽管心脏康复已被证明有好处，但仍未得到充分利用宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Cardiac-rehabilitation-still-underutilized-despite-proven-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Cardiac-rehabilitation-still-underutilized-despite-proven-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b56e8dd-a64b-4c8b-96cb-e2f4c351e540 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 11:48:04 -0500 Cardiac rehabilitation still underutilized despite proven benefits
研究表明肠道病毒在常见表面上可长期存在手足口病（HFMD）是一种传染性疾病，主要影响亚太地区的幼儿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Study-demonstrates-prolonged-persistence-of-enteroviruses-on-commonly-encountered-surfaces.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Study-demonstrates-prolonged-persistence-of-enteroviruses-on-commonly-encountered-surfaces.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a607e010-f876-42bc-a357-d24128587f6a Thu, 23 Nov 2023 11:41:15 -0500 Study demonstrates prolonged persistence of enteroviruses on commonly encountered surfaces
特定的 HLA 等位基因可能与 SARS-CoV-2 感染有关本研究分析并提出了特定 HLA 等位基因与 SARS-CoV-2 感染的潜在关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Specific-HLA-alleles-may-be-linked-with-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Specific-HLA-alleles-may-be-linked-with-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=850f5ff4-4929-41eb-8e74-0d01bbed13d1 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 11:37:08 -0500 Specific HLA alleles may be associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection
遏制制药废水污染：对抗抗菌素耐药性的关键一步抗生素耐药性 (AMR) 是一个日益严重的全球威胁，尤其是在低收入和中等收入国家 (LMIC)，它会导致长期患病、抗生素使用增加、医疗费用增加以及本可避免的死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Curbing-pharmaceutical-ef Fluent-pollution-A-crucial-step-in-fighting-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Curbing-pharmaceutical-ef Fluent-pollution-A-crucial-step-in-fighting-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c543666-c8c0-4631-9a3e-4aad7eec3a66 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 11:34:03 -0500 Curbing pharmaceutical effluent pollution: A crucial step in fighting antimicrobial resistance
JMU Würzburg 教授获得 ERC Consolidator 资助，以推进铁死亡研究欧洲研究理事会 (ERC) 提供令人垂涎的总计 200 万欧元的综合补助金，支持杰出科学家的工作有望取得进一步的顶尖成就。 José Pedro Friedmann Angeli 是维尔茨堡朱利叶斯·马克西米利安大学 (JMU) 鲁道夫·菲尔肖中心 (Rudolf Virchow Center) 综合与转化生物成像中心的转化细胞生物学教授，现在属于该小组。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/JMU-Wurzburg-professor-wins-ERC-Consolidator-Grant-to-advance-research-on-ferroptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/JMU-Wurzburg-professor-wins-ERC-Consolidator-Grant-to-advance-research-on-ferroptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee1dfad2-c7e2-425b-be4f-a70edded3512 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 11:26:41 -0500 JMU Würzburg professor wins ERC Consolidator Grant to advance research on ferroptosis
发现植物蛋白可模仿人类免疫信号蛋白研究人员表明，某些植物蛋白类似于人类免疫系统的信号蛋白，并且可以与其受体结合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Plant- Proteins-found-to-mimic- human-immune-signaling- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Plant- Proteins-found-to-mimic- human-immune-signaling- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7ca6e17-75b9-493c-8f1e-adee58ab69f1 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 11:20:09 -0500 Plant proteins found to mimic human immune signaling proteins
研究表明运动可以抵消睡眠不足和缺氧的负面影响新研究探索了睡眠、氧气水平和锻炼如何影响我们执行脑力任务的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Study-suggests-exercise-can-counteract-the-negative-effects-of-sleep-deprivation-and-hypoxia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Study-suggests-exercise-can-counteract-the-negative-effects-of-sleep-deprivation-and-hypoxia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ada96cc-3d70-4610-835b-0efb43c0d9be Thu, 23 Nov 2023 11:13:28 -0500 Study suggests exercise can counteract the negative effects of sleep deprivation and hypoxia
